catalog.college: College of Science, Technology, Engineering & Mathematics (CSTEM)

source.notes: Official course data comes from the EWU catalog. Use the search deep link as the canonical per-course URL. Avoid relying on in-page anchors, which are not stable.

courses.title: THESIS
courses.prerequisites: Permission of instructor, department chair and college dean.
courses.description_summary: Research thesis conducted under a graduate committee.

courses.title: RESEARCH REPORT
courses.prerequisites: Permission of instructor, department chair and college dean.
courses.description_summary: Research study in lieu of bound thesis, under graduate committee direction.

courses.title: INDUSTRY PROJECT
courses.description_summary: Applied CS project in an industry setting with documentation.

courses.title: DEPARTMENTAL INTERNSHIP
courses.prerequisites: Graduate standing and permission of instructor, department chair and college dean.
courses.description_summary: Departmental support work in CS (e.g., teaching assistance, systems administration, research assistance).
